Package de.javasoft.plaf.synthetica

Interface Summary
SyntheticaLogoRenderer A logo renderer has to implement this interface and return itself.
 

Class Summary
GraphicsUtils Do some graphic enhancements like painting anti-alias text, background images for botton labels, drawing tree lines.
Popup Popup used to support shadow for popus in heavyweight containers.
PopupFactory PopupFactory used to support shadows for heavyweight popups.
StyleFactory Synthetica's StyleFactory.
SyntheticaComboBoxLayoutManager Replacement for the SynthComboBoxUI LayoutManager to modify the arrow button resize behavior.
SyntheticaDefaultLookup Replaces SynthDefaultLookup to install missed defaults.
SyntheticaDefaultTreeCellRenderer Default tree cell renderer used for synthetica trees.
SyntheticaDesktopManager DesktopManager to improve dragging performance for JInternalFrames with translucent borders.
SyntheticaLookAndFeel Synthetica's base Look and Feel.
SyntheticaRootPaneUI Synthetica RootPaneUI to support decorated windows.
SyntheticaScrollPaneLayoutManager Scroll pane layout manager to control horizontal/vertical scrollbar position within scrollpane.
SyntheticaStandardLookAndFeel Synthetica Standard Look and Feel.
SyntheticaState Extended state class which covers additional component states like non-editable (LOCKED).
SyntheticaTitledBorder Titled border - will be installed through UIManager.
SyntheticaTitlePane Synthetica TitlePane to support decorated windows.
 

Enum Summary
SyntheticaState.State
